amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate on the development of democracy in Iran.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2015 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2015 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Brownback. (consideration: CR S13367; text: CR S13367) To express the sense of the Senate on the development of democracy in Iran.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2015 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2015 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Brownback.
